content:
I am going from China to Britain and I need to know the exchange rate
Begin!
Question: Please specify which Chinese currency (e.g., CNY) you would like to convert to British currency (GBP) for the exchange rate information.
Base currency: RMB, Target currency: GBP

The exchange rate from Chinese RMB (CNY) to British Pound (GBP) is approximately 0.1122. This means 1 CNY is equivalent to about 0.11 GBP. The last update for this rate was on January 21, 2025.

Now, I will finalize this information for you.

function.arguments: {"final_answer":"The exchange rate from Chinese RMB (CNY) to British Pound (GBP) is approximately 0.1122. This means 1 CNY is equivalent to about 0.11 GBP. The last update for this rate was on January 21, 2025.","return_type":"give_answer"}
function.name: Finish
